headline: NBA, WBD extend broadcast partnership for 11 years
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) and the NBA have reached an agreement on the league's broadcast rights, extending their partnership for another 11 years. Yahoo Finance anchor Madison Mills joins Brad Smith on Wealth to talk more about the latest headline for the media giant. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: What’s News: Business & Finance
summary: WHATS NEWS BUSINESS FINANCE Many investors are betting the U.S. stock-market rally has room to run, signaling their optimism by pouring money into exchange-traded and mutual funds.  Toy maker Hasbro said it is negotiating with suppliers and considering design changes in anticipation of high tariffs on imports from China that Trump has promised to implement.
